transcript:
Customer: Hello?
Executive: Hello, Ima?
Customer: Ji, good afternoon sir, kaise hain aap?
Executive: Thik hu, abhi toh waise thik nahi hu. Dikkat ye aayi hai bhai ki Vishal sir subah phone baat hui meri. Maine bola ki bhai jo product ka jo upload ka tha na usme dikkat hai. Abhi unko phone kiya toh meeting mein hai. Main aapko bata deta hu unse baat kar lena aur mere ko iska shot out chahiye. Aap apne hisab se aapke mechanism mein hai, mere mechanism mein nahi hai. Pehle ye baat sun lena. Product upload hone deta hai aur successfully batata hai. Jaise maine usko Hammer Star ke liye unko diya tha toh unhone karwa diya. Fir aath se 10 baar karna pada fir wo hua. Fir dusri baar unse baat hui Vishal se ki main aapki wo jo ticket raise hui hai main cancel kar du kar kyuki mere ko wo mat karna. Mere ko fir se ek dusri product dalne do, nayi wali. Jo maine unko teen product di thi na uske upar mere paas 150 product dalni hai. Kitni hai? 125 product upload karni hai. Toh is jaise aapka kaam ho raha hai na us hisab se toh ek do saal toh lag hi jayega mere ko. Ke aapke waha se. Aisa lagta hai. Aur abhi toh abhi kya problem aaya malum hai? Dusra problem raise hua. Ye toh ud jata hai, successfully dikhata hai. Thodi der mein baad hum fir se dekhne ke liye jata hai toh usme se ud jata hai. Hammer Star ka photo ud jata hai. Kyu?
Aisa ek issue aaya. Dusri cheez kya hua? Humari jo Hammer Express D3 ki jo product thi usme maine naya product ka dala. Kehne ka matlab ke naya photo dala toh usme se achi baat likh ke aaya hua aaya ke photo upload kiya hai, successfully kiya hai. Toh humne bola chalo acha hai. Toh wo wo dalne ke baad success uske baad fir se hum andar jane gaye na toh puri ki puri Express D3 ki information hi uda di.
Photo toh chodo, jo product ki information hoti hai na, andar jo humne dali thi mehnat karke.
Ji. Wohi uda di.
Aisa kyu? aisa isliye uda isliye ki aapne apne ye aapke hi side se ho raha hai, mere side se nahi ho raha hai. Aapke hi side se ho raha hai.
Achha. Aapko aisa dekho aapke waha se photo upload kiya, successfully dikha raha hai. Thodi der ke baad hum dekhne jate hai toh Express D3 ki product ka information bhi nahi hai.
Kaun se product ki baat kar rahe hai sir?
Hammer Express D3. Agar aap lana chahte ho toh la ke de do toh meri mehnat bach jayegi.
Ye mere ko fir se pura ka pura details, uska vivran sab kuch dalna padega andar. Information puri ki puri uda di. Photo toh chodo.
Ye aapke waha pe abhi aap mere ko Ima ji bataiye ye kaise possible rahega fir? Hum log ye kaam kar rahe hai ki dusra abhi toh aur bhi niklega aapke waha se. Ye aapki team kya kar rahi hai?
Hammer Express D3 wala product bol rahe hai. Haan.
Wo wali.
Achha, product toh dala hua rejected aap keh rahe ho na ki rejected dikha raha hai. Are rejected information hi nahi hai toh reject kya karu? Reject kya abhi kya karu main? Main ye bolna chah raha hu. Photo chalo upload nahi hota hai toh photo toh main samajh sakta hu. Par uska jo uska jo details likha hota hai na product ka uske sath uda di. Photo pe sir ya fir jo specification pe likha hota hai uski aap baat kar rahe hai? Are aap samjhiye ke nahi? Main koi bhi product ka photo hota hai toh sath mein information aati hai ke nahi? Likhna padta hai ke nahi? Matlab ye product kya hai, kya nahi? Sir, please understand kar rahe hai. Yaar product madam kya karu main aapka? Aap aap product mein jaoge aap product mein jao. Aur product ki information mere ko leni hai toh kaise hoga? Product mein jao. Product mein aap pehle online online aa jaiye, online aa jaiye. Main aapko dikhata hu product mein jaiye aap. Main product mein hi hu abhi aapke sir. Product mein jao toh pehle kya nikal rahi hai? Hammer Star likh likha hua aata hai? Haan haan. Uske niche category acrylic category water resistance product description Hammer Star multipurpose adhesive for PVC acrylic lamination ye sab likha hua aata hai?
PVC acrylic haan sir ye product description mein ji. Description aata hai na? Ye pura ka pura uda diya Hammer Express D3 ka. Sir kaha udaya? Aapka dekhiye na jo rejected mein dala hua hai sir usme toh express Reject kaise aa gaya main wohi toh bol raha hu. Are madam ek baat suno main kya bol raha hu pehle. Aapke waha pe photo upload ho gaya, successfully dikha diya, hum log bahar aa gaye, thik hai?
Hmm. Thik hai? Aap samajh rahe ho main kya bol raha hu? Photo upload ho gaya, successfully dikha diya. Toh hum kya samjhe? Ke bhai photo upload ho gaya hai, success dikha diya. Hum log bahar aa gaye waha se. Khana khane baithe. Khana khane baithne ke baad fir se andar gaye dusri product ke dekhne ke liye toh purani product jo Hammer Express D3 tha wo nikal gaya. Kaha nikal gaya? Rejected mein kaise aa gaya automatically madam?
Achha. Sir reject reject nahi nahi madam madam ek baat samajhti hu. But na sir ek baar na mujhe Vishal sir se baat karne dijiye main iske liye unse Aap Vishal se baat kijiye. Suno suno Vishal se aap baat kijiye. Vishal se last meri baat hui thi toh upload unhone bataya maine bola tha ke ek product mein uske baad meri baat nahi hui toh usme bhi yahi dikkat aayi. Star mein bhi jo product dalte hai photo uska toh usme bhi yahi dikhata hai. Upload hua toh fir nikal jata hai, photo aata nahi hai, thik hai? Fir dusri humne product dali, nayi wali dali jo unko diya nahi tha ye Express D3 ka ke madam mera 125 product ka sab details andar jayega. Bar bar isme hairan aaunga, hairan pareshan hounga toh main business kab karunga aur ye main sab kaise karunga aap samajh sakte ho madam? Ji sir. Ye aapki taraf se hota hai, meri taraf se nahi hota hai. Dusri problem ye aayi ke dusri product dusri product ka photo upload kiya successfully dikhaya aur uske baad dusri baar khana khane ke baad aadha ghante ke baad dekha na toh product ka total information hi uda di jo maine abhi aapko batai ke bhai usme likha hua hai star mein dikhaya ke nahi aapko? Usko padh ke sunaya na maine. Wo puri puri ki puri product hi chali gayi. Kaha chali gayi?
Sir abhi mere ko unko Vishal sir se aane dijiye main unse bolti hu aapko Achha Vishal se maine aapko isliye phone dekho aapke aapke suno suno main aapse maine aapko sirf information supply karne ke liye hi phone kiya tha ke Vishal ko bata dena. Vishal ko maine phone kiya tha wo wo kuch meeting mein hai. Do baar phone kiya par meeting mein hai toh bhai ye do product do option matlab problem create hua hai. Ek toh photo upload hone hi nahi de raha hai. Dusra hone ke baad information uda deta hai.
Achha. Thik hai sir ek baar unko inform kar dijiye. Aap samajh rahe ho? Suno unko unko itna bata dena pehla problem ye aata hai ke photo upload successfully dikha raha hai. Uske baad fir se andar jate hai na thodi der ke baad toh wo photo upload hota hi nahi hai, thik hai? Ek ye problem. Dusri baat dusri dusri nayi product maine unko dali nayi product ka jo Hammer Express D3 karke thi toh wo bhi aisa hi dikhaya photo upload successfully dikhaya hai. Dikhane ke baad kya hota hai ke thodi der baad dekhte hai toh puri ki puri likhawat jo information jo hoti hai na uski product ki description wohi uda diya.
Hmm. Thik hai. Waha se hi nikal gaya. unko inform karti hu is cheez ke liye aur wo bolti hu. Thik hai unko inform karo aap. Bas bas aap unko inform karo aur please main request karta hu madam itna time hamare paas nahi hai. Main subah se isme hi lagaya hua hu. Kisi party ko main phone bhi nahi kar pa raha hu. Aapka AI se connected ho toh madam aap 18vi sadi mein kyu ja rahe ho aapki company? Ye lagta hai mujhe lagta hai ke aapke waha pe koi bhi client hai na toh itna achi tarah se wo manage nahi karta hai. Agar main puri IndiaMART ki side mein ghiss dunga na toh pura ka pura nikal jayega aapka ke bhai ye problem hai, ye problem hai, ye problem hai.
Aap samajh rahe ho? aapko inform karti hu. Thik hai sir. Mere jaise client milenge.
summary:
Concerns:

- Facing issues uploading products. 

- Product information disappearing after successful upload.

- Express D3 product information was completely removed.



Resolution:

- Executive listened to the customer's concerns.

- Assured to inform Vishal about the issues.



Next Steps: 

- Executive will inform Vishal about the issues.



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Angry -> Neutral



@@@Key Topics:

- product upload, technical issue, product information, express d3
